name: Salt tea
tasteDesc: You taste the salt tea. You struggle to drink the tea due to the sheer bitterness as you were about to spit it out. But you still continued drinking. It doesn't feel much salty now. You got used to it. But each sip remind you of the sea, the sun, water, wind. You remember when you tasted the bitter water of the sea. It reminds you of the lovely day...

name: Normal tea
tasteDesc: You order a normal tea. It tasted good! But not great.... It was okay, but it wasn't bad. You felt somewhat unsatisfied, as if you could've ordered something else.....
